articles.title: Shell to stop all Russian oil and gas purchases, apologizes for buying shipment after Ukraine invasion - CNBC
articles.description: Oil major Shell on Tuesday apologized for a buying a heavily discounted consignment of Russian oil last week.
articles.content:
Oil major Shell on Tuesday apologized for a buying a heavily discounted consignment of Russian oil and announced it was withdrawing from its involvement in all Russian hydrocarbons.
